actions.services package¶

Submodules¶

actions.services.Car_Service module¶

class actions.services.Car_Service.Car_Service¶

Bases: object

Car_Service is a logic layer of car actions.

addCar(car)¶

In the method, it is used to add a car

Param

car(JSON object): the car object

Returns

the car object

find_by_car_id(car_id)¶

In the method, it is used to get the car details which match the parameters.

Param

car_id(int): car id

Returns

a dictionary object of the car

getBodyTypes()¶

In the method, it is used to get all the body types.

getCarsWithMake()¶

In the method, it is used to get all the cars information with manufacturer.

getCarsWithparams(params)¶

In the method, it is used to get the car details which match the parameters.

Param

params(JSON object): contains 4 list: make, seat numbers, body types, colors, which are the parameters of each factor

Returns

a list of car details

getColors()¶

In the method, it is used to get all the car color.

getMakes()¶

In the method, it is used to get all manufacturer.

getSeatNumbers()¶

In the method, it is used to get all seat numbers.

removeCar(car_id)¶

Remove car from database

rent(login, data)¶

In the method, it is used to rent the car

Param

login(boolean): whether it need to login first

Param

data(JSON object): the data sent from client ap

Returns

a number which represents different result

reportCar(car_id, admin_id, issue)¶

Report issues of cars :param car_id: car id :param admin_id: who report the issue :param issue: issue

return_car(data)¶

In the method, it is used to return the car

Param

data(JSON object): the data sent from client ap

Returns

a number which represents different result

send_pushbullet_with_report_info()¶

Send notification via Pushbullet API

updateCar(car)¶

Update car details

actions.services.Record_Service module¶

class actions.services.Record_Service.Record_Service¶

Bases: object

Record_Service is a logic layer of booking actions.

book(book_info, user_id)¶

In the method, it is used to book a car. It will add a record and change the status of the booked car.

Param

book_info(JSON object): the booking information sent from web page

Param

user_id(int): the user id of the current user

Returns

the record

cancel_booking(record)¶

In the method, it is used to cancel a car booking, update the status of car and the flag of returning in Records table.

Param

record(Record object): the record which is going to be canceled.

find_all()¶

In the method, it will find the booking history of the current user.

:return

all the booking records

find_by_car_id_and_user_id(car_id, user_id)¶

In the method, it will find the booking record of the current user .

Param

car_id(int): the car id

Param

user_id(int): the user id of current user

:return

the booking record of the current user

find_by_car_id_and_user_id_and_return_and_cancel(car_id, user_id, is_return, is_cancel)¶
find_history_by_user_id(user_id)¶

In the method, it will find the booking history of the current user.

Param

user_id(int): the user id of current user

:return

the booking records of the current user

find_records_by_user_id_with_all_return(user_id)¶

In the method, it is used to check whether the current user has no return cars or booking car.

Param:user_id(int)

the user id of current user

:return

if there are cars not returned or booked by the user, return False; otherwise, return True

actions.services.Report_Service module¶

class actions.services.Report_Service.Report_Service¶

Bases: object

Report_Service is a logic layer of report actions.

add(car_id, admin_id, issue)¶

Add a report data to database

find_the_new_one()¶

Get the lateset report

getReports()¶

To get all the report information

update(report_id, car_id, engineer_id)¶

Update the close date and engineer id to report

Also, update the car status in car table

actions.services.User_Service module¶

class actions.services.User_Service.User_Service¶

Bases: object

User_Service is a logic layer of user actions.

checkUserName(username)¶

In the method, it will check whether or not the username is used.

Param

username(string): username

Returns

if the username is available , return True. If not, return False.

deleteUser(user_id)¶
getUsersWithparams(params)¶

In the method, it is used to get the user details which match the parameters.

Param

params(JSON object): contains 5 parameters: role, username, first_name, last_name, email

Returns

a list of user details

login(username, password)¶

In the method, it will use the username and password encrypted to query whether or not the user is exist.

Param

username(string): login username

Param

password(string): login password

Returns

the user object, if the user is exist or the authentication is valid.

register(username, password, first_name, last_name, email, role)¶

In the method, it will add a new user into database.

Param

username(string): username

Param

password(string): password

Param

first_name(string): first name of the user

Param

last_name(string): last name of the user

Param

email(string): the user’s email

Param

role(string): role of the user

Returns

the user object, if the user is added into the database.

updatePassword(user_id, username, old_password, new_password)¶

Update user password

In the method, it will check whether the user is valid or not, them update password

Parameters

  • user_id – user id:string

  • old_password – username:string

  • new_password – password:string

updateUser(user_id, a_username, a_password, first_name, last_name, email)¶

In the method, it will update user details into database.

Param

user_id(string): user id

Param

username(string): username

Param

password(string): password

Param

first_name(string): first name of the user

Param

last_name(string): last name of the user

Param

email(string): the user’s email

Param

role(string): role of the user

Returns

the user object, if the user is added into the database.
